title: Need a last-minute gift idea? Treat someone to more affordable airfare with Dollar Flight Club, starting at just $60
content:
Macworld

If you’re still searching for the perfect gift for a traveler this year, a new suitcase, travel accessories, and any other physical gift won’t likely come on time for Christmas. Fortunately, there’s a perfect digital gift idea that doesn’t require shipping and could last for life.

Meet Dollar Flight Club, a service that can find your lucky loved one more affordable airfare for life. Now through December 25, you can gift a 2-pack of either the Premium Plan for only $59.97 or a Premium Plus+ Plan for only $139.97. Give both to your giftee or split the membership between yourself and someone special!

Dollar Flight Club can help keep airfare prices down. How it works is that users enter their home city or departure airports, wait for the service to scour the web for discounted flights, and then book their trip once a great deal has been sent to their inbox.

While both Dollar Flight Club plans offer discounted flight tickets, Premium Plus+ members get additional benefits, including access to business and first-class flight deals (in addition to economy). They also get a 20% discount on Mobile Passport Plus and discounted rates on the service’s partners, like Huckberry, Babbel, Acanela Expeditions, and more.

This holiday season, treat a loved one to a lifetime of more affordable travel.

Until December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific, you can grab two lifetime subscriptions for Dollar Flight Club Premium for just $59.97 or Dollar Flight Club Premium Plus+ for just $139.97.

 

Dollar Flight Club Lifetime Subscription

Starting at only $59.97 at Macworld

Prices subject to change.
